temperature.title: temperature
temperature.description: Temperature at which the component is stored.

temperature_unit.title: temperature_unit
temperature_unit.description: The temperature can be specified in units such as K, °C, or °F.

storage_start.title: storage_start
storage_start.description: The date since the component has been stored.

additives.title: additives
additives.description: Additives for the storage of components can include antioxidants, stabilizers, drying agent, or even inert gases (argon, nitrogen), among others.

special_treatment.title: special_treatment
special_treatment.description: If there are any other specific characteristics or aspects related to a component that are important for reproducibility and are not described by the aforementioned metadata, they should be explained       here.
